mapper.select: SELECT p.GOODS_NAME,p.GOODS_NUMBER,p.GOODS_ATTRIBUTE,p.GOODS_UNIT_PRICE,p.GOODS_TATOL_PRICE,p.code69,s.code FROM PURCHASE_ITEM p LEFT JOIN supplier_commodity s ON s.id = p.goods_id WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT g.goods_name AS goodsName, c.code69 AS code69, g.goods_id AS goodsId, g.brand_name AS brandName, g.goods_attribute AS goodsAttribute, g.goods_unit_price AS goodsUnitPrice, g.goods_number AS goodsNumber, g.goods_tatol_price AS goodsTatolPrice FROM PURCHASE_ITEM g LEFT JOIN SUPPLIER_COMMODITY c ON g.goods_id = c.id WHERE ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
